```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(survival)
library(survminer)
library(biostat3)
aids <- read_csv("data/AIDS_Clinical_Trials_Group175.csv")
```

```{r}
aids %>% head()
```

```{r}
#KM
km_fit_trt <- survfit(Surv(time, cid) ~ trt, data = aids)
km_fit_trt %>% ggsurvplot(data = aids,
                      fun = "pct", #can be replaced by cum hazard
                      conf.int = TRUE,
                      risk.table = TRUE,
                      pval = TRUE,  
                      pval.coord = c(0,55),
                      fontsize = 2,
                      ggtheme = theme_light(),
                      xlab =  "Time in days",
                      title = "Kaplan-Meier Survival Function Estimate",
                      legend.title = "",
                      legend.labs = c("ZDV only","ZDV + ddl", "ZDV + Zal", "ddl only"),
                      ylim = c(55, 100))
```

```{r}
#FH
fh_fit_trt <- survfit(Surv(time, cid) ~ trt, type = "fleming", data = aids)
fh_fit_trt %>% ggsurvplot(data = aids,
                      fun = "pct", #can be replaced by cum hazard
                      conf.int = TRUE,
                      risk.table = TRUE,
                      pval = TRUE,  
                      pval.coord = c(0,55),
                      fontsize = 2,
                      ggtheme = theme_light(),
                      xlab =  "Time in days",
                      title = "Fleming-Harrington Survival Function Estimate",
                      legend.title = "",
                      legend.labs = c("ZDV only","ZDV + ddl", "ZDV + Zal", "ddl only"),
                      ylim = c(55, 100))
```

```{r}
#life table
trt0 <- lifetab2(Surv(time,cid) ~ trt, aids)[[1]]
trt1 <- lifetab2(Surv(time,cid) ~ trt, aids)[[2]]
trt2 <- lifetab2(Surv(time,cid) ~ trt, aids)[[3]]
trt3 <- lifetab2(Surv(time,cid) ~ trt, aids)[[4]]

ggplot() + 
  geom_line(data = trt0, aes(x = tstart, y = surv, color = "ZDV only")) +
  geom_line(data = trt1, aes(x = tstart, y = surv,color = "ZDV + ddl")) +
  geom_line(data = trt2, aes(x = tstart, y = surv,color = "ZDV + Zal")) +
  geom_line(data = trt3, aes(x = tstart, y = surv,color = "ddl only")) +
  labs(color = "treatment")
```

```{r}
quantile(km_fit_trt)
```

survdiff(Surv(time, cid) ~ trt, data = aids)
